#labels Featured
iRoeMetz is a Java application which can be used to simulate the results of a number of experiments via Monte Carlo methods given variance components of a theoretical study. These experiment results can be used in MRMC variance analysis programs such as iMRMC. 

  * [IntroToROCReaderStudies Introduction to ROC Reader Studies]: In-depth explanation of MRMC/ROC reader studies

  * [iRoeMetzMethods Technical details]: How iRoeMetz is implemented

  * [iRoeMetzUsage How to use the iRoeMetz application]

  * [iRoeMetzReferences References for iRoeMetz]
